mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, t.description, t.created_at, COUNT(at.article_id) AS count -- 统计关联的文章数量 FROM tag t LEFT JOIN article_tag at ON t.id = at.tag_id -- 左连接确保无文章的标签也会被查询到 GROUP BY t.id -- 按标签ID分组 ORDER BY t.created_at DESC;
SELECT t.id, t.name, t.description, t.created_at, COUNT(at.article_id) AS count FROM tag t LEFT JOIN article_tag at ON t.id = at.tag_id WHERE t.id = #{id} GROUP BY t.id;
